original_text: And he took up his parable, and said, Balaam the son of Beor hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said:
korean_text: 그가 예언을 전하여 말하되 브올의 아들 발람이 말하며 눈을 감았던 자가 말하며

sentences.original_text: And he took up his parable,
Balaam the son of Beor hath said,
and the man whose eyes are open hath said:
